gluttony.question: Did you indulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, leading to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and a rejection of temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking at times
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking at times, neglecting my responsibility to provide for my family's well-being?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: over my financial responsibilities and family needs
prodigality.question: Have I excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my financial responsibilities and family needs, putting at risk resources God has entrusted to me?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: of leisure activities , such as travel or hobbies
for the needs of my family
prodigality.question: Have I allowed my pursuit of leisure activities, such as travel or hobbies, to take precedence over my financial obligations and providing for the needs of my family?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing information about others ' personal lives or flaws
about others ' personal lives or flaws
through conversations or discussions with friends or acquaintances
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing information about others' personal lives or flaws, even if it was true, through conversations or discussions with friends or acquaintances?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing information about my friends ' or acquaintances ' personal lives
about my friends ' or acquaintances ' personal lives
for the sake of entertainment or
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing information about my friends' or acquaintances' personal lives, even if it was true, for the sake of entertainment or to impress others?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did you intentionally choose to work on a Sunday, compromising your rest and worship?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: on a Sunday when otherwise it could be avoided , especially considering my role as a provider for my children
as a provider for my children
impiety.question: Did I engage in productive activities on a Sunday when otherwise it could be avoided, especially considering my role as a provider for my children?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impurity.question: Did I intentionally use practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
